name: A Trip To The Mall At Night
name_original: A Trip To The Mall At Night
description:
The sequel to A Trip to the Store at Night. But don't worry, you don't have to play that one to understand this one. 

Guy and Alma have decided to take the overworked Clerk of the store on an adventure to show him that there are more things in life than his job. After travelling through a mysterious forest and meeting a witch from the distant past they find an impossibly large mall and decide to explore. But of course, things don't go quite as planned as the mall reveals its sinister side. 

It's an RPG with strategic combat and a very unique world filled with strange characters. Currently there is only the free demo which contains the first two areas of the game. There is no official release date, but there will be semi regular development logs to keep those interested updated on progress.

If you like this game please let other people know about it. Tell your friends, your family, your youtube channel, it doesn't matter. The more people that play it the better. Also let me know if you find any bugs, I've checked and I've had friends check, but you never know where they might be hiding.
